{
    "goal": "Promote launch of the new FitTrack Pro smartwatch",
    "benefits": [
        "Accurate heart rate and activity tracking",
        "Stylish and customizable design",
        "Long-lasting battery for all-day use",
        "Smart notifications and app integrations",
        "Waterproof for swimming and workouts"
    ],
    "offer": null,
    "cta_words": null,
    "brand_hex": [
        "#1E90FF",
        "#FFFFFF"
    ],
    "proof_route": "demo",
    "proof_source": null,
    "channel": "tiktok",
    "length_s": 20,
    "vo": true,
    "qr": false,
    "handle_or_url": null,
    "qr_target": null
}
